property.name: targetObject
property.shortdesc: The target document the process is inspecting.

property.name: appliedProfile
property.shortdesc: The preflight profile the process is using.

property.name: processResults
property.shortdesc: The results found by the process as a large string.

property.name: processInventory
property.shortdesc: A string containing a description of all elements visited by the process.

property.name: aggregatedResults
property.shortdesc: The aggregated results found by the process. Can return: Ordered array containing documentName:String, profileName:String, results:Array of Ordered array containing parentNodeID:Long Integer, errorName:String, pageNumber:String, errorInfo:String, errorDetail:Array of Ordered array containing label:String, description:String.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the PreflightProcess &#40;a Application).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the PreflightProcess within its containing object.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: waitForProcess
method.shortdesc: Waits for the process to finish, up to an optional maximum amount of time. No other processes get cycles during this time.

parameter.name: waitTime
parameter.shortdesc: The maximum time to wait, in seconds; if omitted, waits until completion no matter how long it takes. &#40;Optional)

method.name: saveReport
method.shortdesc: Saves a report of the completed preflight process.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The preflight report to save to.

parameter.name: autoOpen
parameter.shortdesc: If true, automatically open the report after creation. &#40;Optional)

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PreflightProcess.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
